text: Can you add custom fonts to the theme overrides css?
Can you add a class to a dnd section??

Hey <@U7SL518D6> Thanks for linking me those docs, I understand the methodology of using global partials for text fields in this instance.

My thought process was to have theme fields for `company_address` etc. so I could use the variables in both the footer as well as in other module blocks throughout the site

The documentation that I was using for theme field types was <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/module-theme-fields>
you might want to consider splitting up the field type docs into `module fields` and `theme fields` because it was misleading seeing them combined.  I assumed that if theyâ€™re listed together then they both must be useable.

Is it possible to use Webpack in development mode with HubSpot instead of production? I tried it and the files it produces are rejected by the HubSpot linter. Is WP development mode only for local development?
